Enter the Credential Name to connect to the SuccessFactors system as deployed in the tenant using Operations Wizard
Proxy service using which request is sent to the server
Type of SuccessFactors query
Choose Model Operation to specify the Entity, Operation Type, Field List and Generate the XSD
Enter parameter key and value in the format key=value separated by semicolon; for example externalKeyMapping=costCenter;processInactiveEmployees=true
Specify page size to retrieve required the number of records per page fetch
Message is processed in batches. Batch size is the value specified in Page Size. Select only in Local Integration Process with loop.
Number of minutes system waits for Operation to complete
SuccessFactors DataCentre using which request is sent to the server

Proxy service using which request is sent to the server
Choose Model Operation to specify the Entity,Operation Type, Field List and Generate the XSD
Format in which request is sent to the server
Character encoding parameter to be used for encoding content
Number of records to be fetched in one cycle
Enter the service root URL
Enter credential name that you have deployed in the tenant
Proxy type to be used to connect to the service
Select OData operation that you want to perform
Enter path to the resource that you want to access
Enter query options separated by ampersand. For example, $top=10&$filter=criteria/roleID eq 'ALL'
